title: Raising small ghosts, SPOs and devs
description: How to raise small SPOs and developers in the Cardano community?

f6_assessments.q0:
Supporting small SPOs and developers aligns with the Cardano mission driving adoption of Cardano. There is no overlap with existing challenges although there are competing challenges in this round. If small SPOs and developers are not economically viable then they will disappear which will change the desired decentralized nature of the Cardano ecosystem.
I strongly agree this challenge is critical to achieve Cardano's mission.
f6_assessments.q1:
The community has the technical capability and faster funding models are a common request. The request is small compared to other challenges and it could inspire improvements applicable to the broader community.
I strongly agree that the Catalyst community has the capacity to address the challenge.
f6_assessments.q2:
The success criteria are relevant to the challenge question.
The key metrics are relevant to the success criteria and mostly measurable.  The variety of possible solutions to the challenge is broad making key metric selection difficult.
I  agree that the success criteria and suggested metrics are set correctly to measure progress in addressing the challenge.

importance: To achieve greater decentralization and resilience in the blockchain through sustainability/feasibility for small SPOs and devs.
success: Small SPOs and developers have more options, services and tools to get delegates and funding + Greater distribution in block minting.
